entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance is creating non-empty generic collections #109034
  • [.NET 9] DllImport with Custom Marshaler Passes non-null address when `null` value for field is specified. #109033
  • Microsoft.Owin.Security.OpenIdConnect not compatible with the latest Microsoft.IdentityModel.XX packages #109032
  • [Proposal] Efficient Dictionary Initialization #109029
  • .NET 8 Timer Implementation Has Silent Period Minimum and TokenBucketRateLimiter Is Not Aware of This #109027
  • [debugger] Inspector exceptions in debugger tests #109025
    10.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.TelemetryTest failing with differing string #109024
  • [API Proposal]: Infinite stack #109023
  • [API Proposal]: System.Formats.Asn1.AsnValueReader #109019
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Keyed services; alternative registration API for existing non-keyed services #109017
  • KeyedService.AnyKey -> not working correctly #109016
  • Options Duplicated ListItem #109015
  • Issue with new X509CertificateLoader #109007
  • Cannot publish android project with ReadyToRun #109004

Closed

  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 35 Regressions on 10/11/2024 8:14:13 PM #108892
    10.0.0
  • Assert debugging `System.Private.CoreLib` in `DEBUG` build #108951
    10.0.0
  • Regression in net9.0 when calling a ServiceClient from a dynamically loaded Assembly #108517
    9.0.0
  • Complex Parse Methods Always Fail #109018
  • Android API 23, Runtime Crash in .NET 9 #106025
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] 2 runtime tests failing with emscripten 3.1.34 #84786
    10.0.0
  • [browser] RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds at dotnet.native.wasm.mono_jiterp_tlqueue_purge_all #108519
    9.0.0
  • MacOSx Binary doesn't support URL Scheme Invocations entry point #31688
  • Proposal: Add support for loading application assemblies in memory #31958
  • Add new API to expose framework information about the current app #33472
  • HebrewCalendar not working properly on client side blazor #107731

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Unroll more Equals/StartsWith/EndsWith on arm64 #109036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose GCInfo size and EH clause count as metrics #109035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] PrecodeStubs contract #109030
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Define a function prototype for YieldProcessor #109028
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Expose CookieException constructors #109026
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add CoherentParentDependency on node packages #109022
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Test: simplify gc memmove #109014
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] Fix nativeaot outerloop #109010
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • Exit with quick_exit when using debug UCRT #109006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Fix nativeaot outerloop #109009
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization
  • [cdac] CodeVersions contract and tests #109021
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Handle building host test assets with stabilized package versions #109031
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 9.0.0
  • Handle building host test assets with stabilized package versions #109020
    area-Host, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix handling of appending keywords to boolean schemas. #108248
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Update the JSON schema exporter to reuse schemas more aggressively. #108800
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [browser] update incorrect references #108352
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [debugger] Throw with short and easily caught message in debugger tests. #109011
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Simplify making IL base JIT Helpers #108349
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Break up try regions in `Compiler::fgMoveColdBlocks`, and fix contiguity later #108914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Initialize m_fInPlaceSS #109013
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Ensure a null PublicKey is supported on assembly refs #108928
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, regression-from-last-release, 9.0.0
  • Initialize m_fInPlaceSS #109008
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable few tests #108977
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • Clean up in importervectorization.cpp #108818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Make System.Formats.Asn1 triple slash documentation the source of truth #108995
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [release/9.0] Ignore *.pp files in .gitignore #109003
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Run new block layout only in backend #107634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Synthesize assembly names by default for ilproj-based tests #108997
    test-enhancement, area-ILTools-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Add trim annotations to System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #108464
    area-System.Configuration
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • Unify dotnet/runtime on using Arcade -publish #108990
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update a few code paths to ensure the trimmer can do its job #106777
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Ensure Vector.Create is properly recognized as intrinsic #108945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Delete IL verification failure helpers in importer #108996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
  • Fix the ListenerElement.Attributes property #108936
    area-System.Configuration, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Do not use link flags for bitcode compilation #108846
    area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Include loongarch64 in supported nativeaot RIDs. #108962
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch to Azure Linux VM #108967
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • Restructure JSImport/JSExport generators to share more code and utilize more Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration shared code #107769
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] WASM debugging #2408

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix `Delegate` dispatch. #2721
    area-CoreclrInterpreter

Updated

  • [SwiftBindings] added basic function and tuple demangling #2718

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change default behavior for the commands that require nuget.org #44312
  • Add a optional reason for the requires msbuild theory/fact attribute #44311
  • Allow running published apps using `dotnet run` #44307
  • Can't make a C++ app with C++/CLI dependency self contained #44305
  • Extended-length paths using prefix "\\?\" do not allow slash characters #44303

Closed

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43848
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43853
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43847

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix installing dependencies in vmr-build.yml #44314
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Aspire fixes #44313
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [FIX] tool-install: Use restore action config options #44309
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Enable signing on all except pgo #44306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Sync analyzer rules with ASP.NET Core, fix issues and update code to newer C# #44304
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-VMR
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2564066 #44252
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable is shipping package in the installer redist to stabilize branding of the installers #44289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Install dependencies on macOS #44294
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Containers] Fix insecure registry handling to use the correct port for the HTTP protocol #44235
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Continue printing out redirected process output after we detect browser launch URL. #44290
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove manual home variable lookup #44266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Generate VSMSBuildExtension package in join point #44288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #44203
    Area-Infrastructure
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    Area-Tools, 9.0.2xx
  • Dotnet test integration #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Javiercn/replace swa globbing #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Compromise design for extensions #8519
  • Simple encoding of unions in C# #7544
  • Proposal: `field` keyword in properties #140
    Working Set
  • Enum extensions #3491
  • [Proposal] Functional Interfaces #3452
  • [Proposal]: Unbound generic types in `nameof` #8480
    Any Time
  • Declaration of ref/out parameters in lambdas without typename #338
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Create YAEP (Yet Another Extensions Proposal) #8525

Updated

  • Fix incorrect metadata representation section for ref readonly returns #8518

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `!` does not suppress nullable warning from spread element type #75560
  • Msbuild failed when processing the file. Message: The task "ResolveComReference" is not supported on the .NET Core version of MSBuild #75558

Closed

  • LightBulb Preview buffer leaks via LSP #75492
  • WorkspaceRegistration.RaiseEvents is broken #23474
    Backlog
  • Use-Auto-Property may need updating for struct-types fields used with ref-this extensions methods. #23257
    Backlog
  • Flaky test: TestGetDiagnostics2 #23188
    Backlog
  • Intellisense not properly picking up model members when using @model IEnumerable <type> #23040
    Backlog
  • Compatibility between Microsoft.Code.Anaysis and netCore apps #20299
    Backlog
  • [Completion] Easy to accidentally commit wrong completion value for extension methods #24044
    Backlog
  • Code Style: enforce named arguments for literals #19186
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Set text selection after the refactoring is applied. #23604
    Backlog
  • Quick info whitespace and sizing issue #23781
    Backlog
  • VisualStudioIntegrationTests throw System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException : Command "View.ShowSmartTag" is not available. #21750
    Backlog
  • Multiple line cursor inserting spaces for only last selected line when pasting items #23328
    Backlog
  • Possible refactoring: turn task.Result into await #22982
    Backlog
  • Formatting throws an unhandled NullReferenceException after upgrading to 2.x #22870
    Backlog
  • VB: Editor should provide option to preserve whitespace around assignment operator. #22818
    Backlog
  • Define expectations for non-EditorConfig option storage #18817
    Backlog
  • System.NullReferenceException is thrown at Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.UnitTests.Workspaces.TestWorkspace.Dispose #21710
    Backlog
  • Exception on Mono: Msbuild failed when processing the file '.csproj' with message: Operation is not supported on this platform. #21609
    Backlog
  • Ubuntu : Document count is 0 for project opened using OpenProjectAsync using Mono #21419
    Backlog
  • MEF and Workspaces crash with ReflectionTypeLoadException on Mono #20275
    Backlog
  • Calling ExpandAsync on Visual Basic MemberAccessExpressionSyntax with a call to a constructor renames 'New' to '[New]' #19864
    Backlog
  • Investigate behavior of "orphan" files during a code fix #19952
    Backlog
  • Deterministic property in msbuild is ignored in loaded project options #19651
    Backlog
  • Move type to file duplicates assembly level attributes #19707
    Backlog
  • VB: Intellisense for members of delegates created as lambda expressions in With-statement. #19337
    Backlog
  • Handle special edge case in simplification #19368
    Backlog
  • Smart variable naming creating conflicts #19261
    Backlog
  • Autocomplete inserts unnecessary qualified name of type when member is of the same name #19011
    Backlog
  • VS Integration tests should install an AssertListener in the VS process #18704
    Backlog
  • Generate Constructor: doesn't offer to pick base members for new location #18439
    Backlog
  • FAR results in Web Application projects could use improvement #18382
    Backlog
  • Resolve usings won't resolve for internalsvisible interfaces #18233
    Backlog
  • VB: Move Type to File carries over wrong XML Comments when code file starts with a Delegate. #17879
    Backlog
  • Fix usage of Experimental/InstalledByMSI flags in *.vsixmanifest files. #17538
    Backlog
  • Refactoring: Simplify name incorrectly applies the wrong fix #17396
    Backlog
  • Convert to interpolated string doesn't work for concatenated strings #17215
    Backlog
  • Generate Constructor defaults to fields and not auto-props #17087
    Backlog
  • Override completion issue when committing with parenthesis #16770
    Backlog
  • Undo doesn't work after suppressing a diagnostic in a newly created GlobalSuppression.cs #16691
    Backlog
  • All IDE "Suggestion" diagnostics are shown as "Hidden" in the ruleset editor #16695
    Backlog
  • Convert to Interpolated String leaves newlines in parenthesized expressions #16251
    Backlog
  • Wrong IntelliSense list in nested With statement #15878
    Backlog
  • Encapsulate field consecutive capital letters #15987
    Backlog
  • Can't search VS options for "Suggest usings for types in NuGet packages" #14975
    Backlog
  • Remove IVT from MS.VS.LanagageServices to CodeLens once we stop supporting Roslyn.sln on Dev14 #13627
    Backlog
  • Wrong overload in intellisense in C# #7898
    Backlog
  • [nuget add using] can't resolve a fully qualified type name #8730
    Backlog
  • Feature request to improve the light bulb experience when multiple issues present in a line of code #5384
    Backlog
  • Loading Microsoft/CodeContracts with MsBuildWorkspace will hit assertion #3926
    Backlog
  • Duplicate code fixes reported if analyzer reference is installed as a VSIX as well as a nuget reference #4030
    Backlog
  • Expose Signature Help API #3540
    Backlog
  • project.OutputFilePath is null #22732
    Backlog
  • Need an integration test for lightweight solution load. #17430
    Backlog
  • 4 VSI tests skipped due to ErrorListPackage load failure blocking VSI runs #13032
    Backlog
  • Test VS crash in BasicGoToDefinition.ObjectBrowserNavigation or BasicGenerateTypeDialog.BasicToCSharp, followed by lots of test failures #21009
    Backlog
  • Failing test: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.UnitTests.Structure.StructureTaggerTests.CSharpOutliningTagger_RegionIsDefinition #20106
    Backlog
  • No information on completion in xml tag in xml doc #22720
    Backlog
  • Code Style: Analyzer + Code fix for spacing #7067
    Backlog
  • RPS and Jenkins should be isolated from Elfie database updates #9589
    Backlog
  • Go To Implementation does not focus window if covered #22083
    Backlog
  • Provide extensibility system to map custom completion tags to completion images+filters #18649
    Backlog
  • [Suggestion] Find all references filter and/or grouping for XML comments #18641
    Backlog
  • Inlining ref returns scenario needs to be enabled through IDE #17132
    Backlog
  • Convert unsigned decimal to hexadecimal in Visual Basic #20982
    Backlog
  • Use different editorconfig files for build configurations #21332
    Backlog
  • ReplacementChangesSemantics fails to detect certain breaking changes #20698
    Backlog
  • VB: Editor should NOT automatically remove digit grouping character for decimal literals. #22627
    Backlog
  • Get warning after update all dependencies for package Microsoft.CodeAnalysis on Visual Studio 2017 #22290
    Backlog
  • Having an item that is both a source file and an additional item breaks DPL and CPS #19968
    Backlog
  • A small usability tweak for F2 - Automatically discard surrounding whitespace in requested new name #22544
    Backlog
  • VS crash: ArgumentException from ExternalErrorDiagnosticUpdateSource.AddNewErrors #22522
    Backlog
  • Using Roslyn to analyze a .NET Framework project with .NET Core #22415
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Offer to Implement Interfaces or Abstract Class from within type body #22401
    Backlog
  • Fix all for simplify name distinguishes between constructors and static member accesses #22713
    Backlog
  • Simplifier.Expand() generates incorrect node for Linq extension method invocation #20311
    Backlog
  • EnvDTE.CodeElement.GetStartPoint(vsCMPartBody)/GetEndPoint(vsCMPartBody) throw COMException for expression-bodied methods and properties #21306
    Backlog
  • VB.NET: using predefined type name as field name in value tuple automatically replaced by framework type name #21661
    Backlog
  • "Tested by data point" in CodeLens is failing because RemoteCodeLensReferencesService is returning a collection containing nulls #20131
    Backlog
  • ExpandSelection/ReduceSelection Option #22590
    Backlog
  • Typing (or overtyping) the close paren of a using statement indents the next line #22508
    Backlog
  • GlobalOptionService.SetOptions doesn't support non-WorkspaceOptionSet #15122
    Backlog
  • Implement abstract class ignores language version #19684
    Backlog
  • Better quickinfo for nullable operators #21494
    Backlog
  • Offer "using static" from unbound members to their types #22099
    Backlog
  • Caret incorrectly placed in virtual space after enter with non-standard tab/indent widths #21919
    Backlog
  • Suggest names for VB variables. #21621
    Backlog
  • Feature Request: Offer built-in fix to convert static call to extension method to instance call #21483
    Backlog
  • [Completion] Request to add a new tag for static and maybe other modifiers. #21345
    Backlog
  • Add Parameter to Constructor doesn't generate unique names w.r.t. locals defined in the constructor #21112
    Backlog
  • Fix All for "Insert Digit Separators" and "Change base for numeric literals" would be nice #21116
    Backlog
  • Update "Add Parameter to Constructor" to allow adding multiple parameters at once #21113
    Backlog
  • Remove Unused Variable does not consider other targets/heads #21085
    Backlog
  • Generate Overrides allows member ordering in the UI but doesn't obey the chosen ordering #21081
    Backlog
  • Suggestion: Have option for intellisense to display method parameters on new lines for readability #21036
    Backlog
  • Add null check should trigger snippet mode so that I know that I need to edit the code it just added #21001
    Backlog
  • Friend vs internal in dotnet_naming_symbols.*.applicable_accessibilities #20893
    Backlog
  • NamedParameterCompletionProvider could mandate named arguments after an out-of-position argument #20657
    Backlog
  • [Suggestion] Cursor insertion mode #20328
    Backlog
  • Show autocomplete for well-known xml namespaces in VB xml literals #20251
    Backlog
  • Validate the new root is a CompilationUnitSyntax in Document.WithSyntaxRoot #20082
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Prefer Cancel() rather than Commit() when rename is async. #75562
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownloadAndReference to avoid including msbuild dependencies #75561
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #75559
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Prototype string literals in data section #75557
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Dispose of ITextDocument(s) when closing preview view #75551
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: nullable analysis of spread element expression #74686
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • VB: Do not use overload resolution for expression tree conversion #75490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Access services on Solution rather than workspace in Razor cohost (Roslyn OOP) scenarios #75545
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Change commit to async when enter is pressed #75335
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Migrate Codelens provider to .NET #74321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [WIP] Pass `runningProject` to `GetUpdateAsync` and get projectToRebuild and projectToRestart back #75503
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not lex `..` as a single DotDotToken #75549
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revise expression parsing #75553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache checksum computation at an collection-element level #75479
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [release/dev17.12] EE: Handle notification when metadata has been invalidated (#75423) #75518
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Platform - Mono CoreClr
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #75555
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Publishing with NativeAOT and trimming results in broken code #58509
  • Applying Authorize attribute to Blazor component only works on a page level. #58508
  • Performance Regression in Blazor WebAssembly with .NET 9 #58507
  • Blazor uses a fallback authorization strategy, and the component is not rendered normally. #58505
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #58504
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #58503
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #58502
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #58501
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #58500
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #58499
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #58498
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #58497
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #58496
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #58495
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #58494
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #58493
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #58492
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #58491
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #58490

Closed

  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextSansFilter #58467
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #58483
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #58367
  • When build an ASP.NET Web App, throw "The input string '0/001838235294' was not in a correct format.'" exception! #58422
    9.0.0
  • Perf regression: fortunes_spring #58427
  • SignalR callbacks working on net7.0, not on net8.0 #58485
  • JSInterop Exception in Published Blazor WebAssembly App (Server Mode) #58454
  • Debugging Blazor Server running in a dev container (WSL) #58151

PullRequests

Created

  • Add scope for internal npm packages #58512
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Add scope for internal npm packages (#58476) #58511
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 9.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Upgrade `serialize-javascript` transient dependency #58510
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `71815bb` to `df1544b` #58506
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to latest released. #58481
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Use MacOS-13 in CI #58465
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade `serialize-javascript` transient dependency #58466
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Provide analyzer for removing unneeded public partial class Program #58482
    analyzer, feature-mvc-testing, area-minimal
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-networking
  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [CollectionView] Review Strategies to reduce Child Measure Propagation #25391
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • DataTrigger doesn't change Rectangle background color on iOS #25385
  • Garbage Collection causes a freeze with Shell. #25382
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • .NET MAUI Windows app can't start #25372
  • OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25371
  • Collection View Scrolling Not Smooth on iOS 18 (Version 8.0.92), While Versions 8.0.40 and iOS 17 Perform Smoothly #25369
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Android RefreshView in a grid can break the grid layout #25368
    Backlog
  • Android Grid.WidthRequest/Grid.HeightRequest mismatches Grid.Measure results #25365

Closed

  • ImageButton with Style set crashes Android app #25388
  • [net9-rc2] Trim analysis warning IL2026 using XamlTypeResolver with Compiled Bindings #25199
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Mac Catalyst MAUI build Application Name appearing as Assembly Name - Causing Apple Rejection #25364
  • .NET9 GA Backport Tracking #25327
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Images, loaded from stream, are not displayed in Release mode on Android using .NET 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.12 version #25283
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Hyper v activation #25354

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Titlebar name API and add templates #25390
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [gh actions] introduce "inclusive heat sensor" #25389
  • Set title on maui-blazor template window #25387
    area-templates
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #2 #25378
    area-testing
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25374
  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Fix for Single item alignment issue in CollectionView HorizontalGrid Layout #25370
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Fixed CollectionView MeasureFirstItem Rendering issue #25367
    community ✨
  • Moving last Xamarin.UITests to Appium #25366
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Android] Create `DatePickerDialog` on demand #25363
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update .NET MAUI template with .NET 9 hovercraft bot 🤖 #25383
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Report XC0025 as an error only in strict compilation mode #25298
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Fix passing message arguments to BuildException when logging warning as error #25326
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [nuget-msi-convert] Do not use new VS component IDs #25355
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Add services.AddHybridWebViewDeveloperTools() extension to enable browser dev tools #25330
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [main] Make main net9 #25351
  • Fix Test Screenshots with new clipping code #25381
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [net9.0] Run device tests arm #25375
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Fix support for x:TypeArguments on root node #25287
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [X] inherit DataType based on attribute #25296
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] disable AOT warning on InitComp #25297
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [UITest] Remove the bottom section of iOS UITest (#24586) #25353
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [net9.0] Fix CV2 handler and uitests fixes #25361

Updated

  • [net9.0][Enhancement][Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [net9.0][Enhancement][iOS] Add a done button to entry #24645
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Merge sr9 into net9 ga #25265
  • HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes (batching version) #24823
    community ✨
  • Improve performance of rendering `DatePicker` #24948
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Propagate any Page.Title to the window, not just for Shell #25338
    area-templates, area-controls-window
  • [ios,tests] Fix iOS Header with Group #25157
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #1 #25178
    area-testing
  • Improve TextToSpeech function by adding a speech rate parameter #24798
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-gestures
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] compile StaticResource w/ generics #25352
    area-xaml
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Propagate x:DataType from parent scope to "standalone bindings" #25295
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for TextDecorations not updating after modifying Label text #25339
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Android] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Run device tests arm #25331
    do-not-merge
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Fix for picker on hidden page opens after back navigation in Android #25319
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨
  • [XC] Add file info to exception reports #25359
    area-xaml
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu
  • [Android] Reset ListView ScrolledEventArgs.ScrollY when ItemsSource changes #25362
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-listview
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Re-enable tests #25268
    .NET 9.0 GA

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression going from .NET/EF 8 to 9 with CosmosDb, will no longer save/load Ulid and Custom struct types #34936

Closed

  • EF9 Auto-compiled models EFStartupProject & multiple "startup" projects #34935
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `efcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #34848
  • Encrypted attribute convention throws exception in Select projection in EF Core 9.0.0-rc.2.24474.1 #34934

PullRequests

Merged

  • Enable flow to release/8.0-staging and release/9.0-staging #34933
